item.title: About
item.author: saahil@claypools.com (Saahil Claypool)
item.description: Note: slightly more information can be found on my old website at claypools.org I am a computer science major currently studying at Worcester Polytechnic Institute (WPI) class of 2019. I live in Acton, Massachusetts and graduated from the Acton-Boxborough Regional High School in 2015. In my free time I play a lot of soccer; I played Varsity soccer in High School and was the Captain my senior year. I played one year of college.
